trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdating" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento de <see cref="E:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdating" /> .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdating> event is raised before an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> to a row.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdating> é gerado antes de uma <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> para uma linha.

trans-unit.source: When you are using <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>, there are two events that occur for each data row updated.
trans-unit.target: Quando você estiver usando <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>, há dois eventos que ocorrem para cada linha de dados atualizada.

trans-unit.source: The order of execution is as follows:
trans-unit.target: A ordem de execução é o seguinte:

trans-unit.source: The values in the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> are moved to the parameter values.
trans-unit.target: Os valores no <xref:System.Data.DataRow> são movidos para os valores de parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdating%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdating%2A> é gerado.

trans-unit.source: The command executes.
trans-unit.target: O comando é executado.

trans-unit.source: If the command is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, and the first returned result is placed in the <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.
trans-unit.target: Se o comando é definido como `FirstReturnedRecord`, e a primeira retornou o resultado é colocado no <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.

trans-unit.source: If there are output parameters, they are placed in the <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver parâmetros de saída, eles são colocados no <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdated%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdated%2A> é gerado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A> é chamado.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use both the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdating> and <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdated> events.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdating> e <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdated> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdating> event returns this output:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdating> evento retorna essa saída:

trans-unit.source: event args: (command=System.Data.SqlClient.SQLCommand commandType=2 status=0)
trans-unit.target: event args: (command=System.Data.SqlClient.SQLCommand commandType=2 status=0)

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdated> event returns this output:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdated> evento retorna essa saída:

trans-unit.source: event args: (command=System.Data.SqlClient.SQLCommand commandType=2 recordsAffected=1 row=System.Data.DataRow[37] status=0)
trans-unit.target: event args: (command=System.Data.SqlClient.SQLCommand commandType=2 recordsAffected=1 row=System.Data.DataRow[37] status=0)

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" /> to <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" /> para <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.IDbCommand" /> to execute during <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Data.IDbCommand" /> a ser executado durante o <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Data.StatementType" /> values that specifies the type of query executed.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores <see cref="T:System.Data.StatementType" /> que especifica o tipo da consulta executada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping" /> sent through an <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping" /> enviado por meio de um <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlRowUpdatingEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlRowUpdatingEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> to execute when performing the <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> a ser executado ao realizar a <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> to execute when performing the <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> para executar ao executar o <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" />.
